title: Global Beast Tamer: I Can See the Path of Evolution
summary: After traveling through time, I got the weakest little snowball as my pet, which couldn’t even evolve? Do I really have to be a waste for the rest of my life? Ding! The System lights up! What! I actually saw the hidden evolution route! Who said it was the weakest! Evolve! Ice Queen!

title: Starting as the Black Dragon BOSS
summary: Useless Professional Binds with the Strongest Part-Time System, Transforms into a Black Dragon BOSS Crushing Everything!

title: Spring Breeze of the Wasteland
summary:
Set in the Soviet Union, the mysterious girl named Berka and the quiet boy Shchenok help a Socialist Party member to escape from the secret police. Their aim is to infiltrate into a certain mansion that holds what they seek, but the secret police immediately capture the two. Will they be able to find what they seek and endure the torture of the secret police?

---
- **Won the 18th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2014**

title: I Work Nine To Five In The Immortal Cultivation World
summary: Hua Qingyuan, died suddenly due to being overly exhausted from working the ‘996’ schedule. However, he found himself transported to a fantasy world and became a disciple of the Qingyun Sword Sect. Determined not to repeat the mistakes of his past life, he resolved to work only 8 hours a day and not to spend even a half a minute practicing cultivation. He became an anomaly in the entire Qingyun Sword Sect, lazily lying under a tree while others practiced day and night. He enjoyed his life after work, while others worked tirelessly on their swordsmanship. Nevertheless, his almost abnormal talent in swordsmanship made him a formidable presence. In the face of requests from his master, fellow disciples, and the sect leader, as well as sudden attacks from the demonic sect and challenges from other young talents, he remained resolute: do not bother me until it’s time to work!

title: That’s Not What My Will Said
summary:
In a world where extraordinary powers called *" Beneïsons "* govern everything; only a boy named Kleis was granted the gift of the *" Seint Graal "*, a power whose use he could not even understand.

Despite this, he did not lose heart and formed a party with his childhood friend Hinoka, who possessed the beneïson of the *" Seint de l'Espee "*, to carry out guild missions. However, due to a minor misunderstanding and betrayal, his mind and body were shattered.

At the same time, Kleis' beneïson revealed its true potential. The *" Seint Graal "* was the pinnacle of power, capable of granting any beneïson in existence to himself or others.

Having lost everything, yet now holding the power to gain everything, what will he choose? The end of the world or something else?

title: Our gap
summary: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.

title: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!
summary: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.

title: Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: After Becoming Financially Free, They Offered Their Loyalty
summary: Shen Yuan, handsome and rich, became a second-generation loser and was mercilessly abandoned by his money-worshipping girlfriend after his family’s business shut down. However, because of this, he obtained the [Perfect Life] system. As long as he spent money on the opposite sex with a favorability of 60, he could receive double the amount back. From that moment on, he made full use of the system to win the hearts of beautiful women and earn a fortune. The more he spent, the richer he became. He spent money like water and rose to the top 0.1%, living a happy entrepreneurial life filled with endless passion

title: I Got Lucky and Pulled a 10th Rank Summon
summary:
In the most realistic VR game “Last Savior”. Every player will get a chance to summon a Follower Spirit. The Follower Spirits are ranked from 1 – 9. And obviously, everyone wants a rank-9 spirit. However, the one that I pulled has an unheard-of rank…

[What on earth is going on?]
“Yeah…”
I don’t get it either.

title: God-level Assassin, I’m the Shadow
summary:
In a world where people sleep and enter the realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who had sacrificed everything for his sister, is betrayed by her.
However, fate grants him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world appears.
This time, Qin Feng chooses to abandon his sister and focus on becoming the strongest.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: The Cotton Candy Lady’s Candy Shop
Situationship
summary:
"Yoonjae," who's in their first year of being a solo act and doesn't like dating, but still wants physical affection, encounters the arrival of "Minseok" at their company, who seems popular with everyone. 

Minseok suggests going out for drinks separately with Yoonjae, but there are no texts asking if Yoonjae got home safely. Minseok's attitude is ambiguous, mixing pleasant words with drawing boundaries. 

They share meals, watch movies, and have physical contact, yet they're not officially dating. What kind of relationship are we in? Something other than dating for us in our 30s.

title: White Rabbit in Wonderland
summary: No summary available.

title: The Ultimate Shut-In
summary: While searching for a brave candidate to become a magical girl and defend the world from evil, a mythical creature finds Kayo Majiba, a cute young lady who seems like the perfect fit. But when this newly turned magical girl proves to be a crude delinquent who goes berserk in a conflict, it becomes clear that this may have been a terrible mistake. Now evil—and any innocent bystanders—will face the rage of a magical girl gone wrong!

title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
summary: Kanae Yano, a 28-year-old single woman with no boyfriend, is suddenly summoned to another world. There, she encounters Rita Scryne, the duke's daughter who looks exactly like her, and Rita's father, Zack. They ask her to take Rita's place in an arranged marriage with the ruthless and feared King Eugene Astaroth—known as the "Merciless Wolf." Upon learning that the summoning magic can bring people from another world but cannot send them back, Kanae finds herself with no choice but to accept. However, when she meets King Eugene, she makes a shocking discovery—his true identity is none other than her first love!

title: Chronicles of the Demon Faction
summary:
In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans… Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)

title: I Reincarnated as the Villainess in a Mobile Novel, but I’ll Use My Professional Skills to Avoid the Bad End!
The Villainess Wants to Coexist
summary:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

title: See You, My King
summary: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

title: Remember Me
summary:
Magic school is a lot harder when you're trying not to die!

Life seemed perfect for Oriana after she started dating Vincent in the winter of her fifth year at the academy. Little did she know, her beloved would soon die under suspicious circumstances. Before she can process anything, she wakes up to find herself back in her seven-year-old body with no idea how she died. When she finally returns to the magic academy in hopes of reuniting with her boyfriend, she finds out Vincent has no memory of her! Now she's back at square one. Can Oriana navigate this second chance at life and change the course of Vincent's fate? Making her crush work out really is a matter of life and death!

title: The Tutorial is Too Hard
summary:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.

title: The Villainous Woman Who Ruined a Nation Starts Her Revenge Drama with the Cold-Blooded Duke
I Am in the Same Class as the Crazy Male Leads
summary:
"On an Unbelievably Unlucky Day, I Got Hit by a Truck and Woke Up to Find Myself in the Crazy Novel I Wrote Back in High School.

And it’s filled with nothing but utterly unhinged male leads!

There’s Kang Seonwoo, the top student with impeccable manners but secretly a psychopath.  
Cha Ihan, the rough-looking delinquent with puppy-like charm, yet an obsessive clingy maniac—only for the heroine.  
And Kim Chanseung, a promising national swimmer... who also happens to be a stalker!

“What was I even thinking when I wrote this back in high school?!”

I just need to stay far away from these lunatics and live quietly!  

But life never goes the way you want it to, does it...?

"Let me know if there’s something you don’t like. I want to get closer to you."  
A friend request from the psychopath.  
"Aren’t you too close to those boys? Isn’t that a bit much for someone so conservative?"  
Jealousy from the misdirected obsessive.  
"Here, take this."  
And protein-flirting from the national swimmer-stalker.

What is wrong with all of them?! Why are they like this with me?!

Can I... actually survive here...?"

title: Dangerous Office Romance
summary:
Raised by conservative educator parents, Jisoo could never dream of straying far from their high moral standards. 
However, there was that one time when she had a passionate one-night stand with a cute stranger she met while clubbing with her friends.
To her great surprise, she runs into him five years later as her company's newly appointed CEO!

title: At This Rate, I’ll Die So the Villainess Decided to Become a Diva!
I Will Tame the Tormented Prince in this Life
My Male Lead Is the Northern Black-Haired Grand Duke
Your Highness i Decide My Fate
summary: Betrayed by her family and sentenced to die as an experiment, Phillie Lutner awakens the Tarot Cards of Fate, a Divine Relic with the power to rewrite time. Determined to reclaim her life, she uses their magic to escape her former fiancé, outsmart her scheming half-sister, and claim her rightful place as heir to the House of Lutner. But as she uncovers a dark plot surrounding the Relics, one question remains - can she break free from the past and build a future with those she loves, or is she doomed to repeat her tragic fate?

title: My Lover’s Personality Is a Little Strange
summary: After a fateful encounter as children, Evonne and the outcast prince, Theo, can’t deny their deep connection. However, their lives are torn apart when Evonne’s family is wrongly accused of treason, leading to their ruin. Cursed and forced to disguise herself as a man, Evonne struggles to survive until Theo finally finds her and uses all his power as emperor to take her with him. Together, they’ll start a journey facing challenges that’ll test their love as they try to start a life together.

title: Pretty Woman
summary:
At her brother Touma's wedding, Fuyuka Nishi falls in love with Akito, a handsome young man who is just her type. In order to win Akito's favor, Fuyuka tries to get some information on him from her brother, but Touma, who knows about Akito's bad reputation, is in denial and tries hard to undermine Fuyuka's infatuation towards Akito. He accidentally says the following: "Although Akito pretends to be tough, he is actually the type of guy who wants to be dominated by women without any limitations" (a lie). Without knowing it, Akito goes to the aquarium with Fuyuka for a date -...?

| male | anal, muscle, nipple stimulation, prostate massage, sole male |
| female | big breasts, blowjob, domination loss, femdom, glasses, handjob, nakadashi, sole female |
| other | multi-work series |

title: Worthless Regression
summary:
In Aeria, a place where people from various worlds are summoned, the weak are destined to die.

Lee Sungmin, a talentless mercenary, was no exception. Fortunately for him, a mysterious item he finds before his untimely death sends him back to the past.

Now a 13-year-old with a second chance at life, Sungmin begins his desperate journey to become Aeria's strongest with no money or talent.

Will effort alone be enough to make a hero of a boy with absolutely nothing?

title: Cheating Men Must Die
summary:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."

title: The Wicked You Sink Into This Love
summary:
Evelyn marries Wilfred to help her sickly sister.

Wilfred is popular in high society and wealthy, but continues to cheat on her even after their marriage. However,
when he returns home, he embraces Evelyn.

"Have you grown tired of me? So why do you make love to me?"

Evelyn is troubled by her relationship with Wilfred. She
thought it was a loveless marriage, but Wilfred's deeper intentions begin to emerge...

The story of a married couple who love each other but deceive each other begins now.

title: I Thought It’s a Common Possession
summary: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?

title: Ready Shoot, For love
summary:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!

title: Three Months of Summer
summary: This is a story about two girls who live in the corner of their class and enjoy their summer vacation. This is a short update project for the month of August. During this period, the story will progress as 'real time' = in-world time. The story will be updated only during the month of August.

title: Marriage with the Archduke, I Know Now
The Secret Game of Nobles
summary: An all-color alternate story of the original classic, Space Adventure Cobra.

title: Even though you know it’s crazy
Necromancer’s Evolutionary Traits
summary:
After clearing the game Peccata for the twelfth time, Kim Jinhwan finds himself inside its world as Adrias Cromwell, a weak and cowardly character who always ends up dead!

With six months left until he gets killed along with his master for practicing forbidden magic, Adrias starts training and gathering corpses to better his necromancy, determined to survive. 

But will this long-time gamer's necromancy skills and pre-existing knowledge be enough to change the sequence of events?

title: Bloody Marriage
summary:
Scarlett was a happy girl. With beautiful looks, a wealthy family, and even a kind fiancé, Scarlett was expected to be the most beautiful bride in the world. But on the morning of her wedding day, the pure-white bride was killed by someone. When she opened her eyes again, everything was different.   
  
"I've told you many times before. It's because I'm Scarlett Antwerp!"   
  
"I'm sorry, but the Esteemed Daughter of the Count, Lady Entwerp, is already dead."   
  
Waking up in a strange place, Scarlett could not understand what had happened to her. Why couldn't anyone recognize her? Why was her fiancé standing next to another woman? Why was she Vivian instead of Scarlett, the Esteemed Daughter of the Count? Why was the one next to her not her fiancé Edward, but Alexis, the police chief? Scarlett swore that she'd get her fiancé back and get revenge on the one who killed her.

title: The Saintess Returns as a Villain
summary: Beatrice has lived as a saint for 10 years to prevent the disaster of the empire and win the love of her family. One day, her place as a saint was taken away by a girl named Lina Cumbell with her black hair... “I will kill you, your family, and all your followers.” She is framed as a warlock and executed. Beatrice's second life began like that. “Even if this life becomes a villainess… Lina, I will avenge you!!” The new life of Riche, a true saint who decided to become a villain, is redrawn.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Bed Partner
summary: Still single at age 33, Haruki Shiina is standing at the biggest crossroads of her life. While unlucky in love, she's popular among her female coworkers for her laidback and boyish personality. The only one who gives her the cold shoulder is Risa Takagai, a beautiful and capable new hire who is already climbing her way up the corporate ladder. Haruki sees her as her biggest rival and is sure that the feeling is mutual, but why does Risa always seem to be watching her...?

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.
